actions.committee: Senate Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition and Forestry
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition and Forestry.

official_title: A bill to exempt disaster payments made in connection with the 1977 crops of wheat, feed grains, upland cotton, and rice from any payment limitations.

summary.text: Exempts disaster payments made in connection with the 1977 crops of wheat, feed grains, upland cotton, and rice from the payment limitations contained in the Agricultural Act of 1970 and the Agricultural Act of 1949.

titles.title: A bill to exempt disaster payments made in connection with the 1977 crops of wheat, feed grains, upland cotton, and rice from any payment limitations.
